FuncDef: Thecbscommand is used to define the default committed buffer size for the template queue or the CBS for the template policer. Overall, the cbs command follows the same behavior and provisioning characteristics as the cbs command in the SAP ingress and egress QoS policy.

ParaDef.Info: For the queues, the size parameter is an integer expression of the number of kilobytes reserved for the queue. If a value of 10 kbytes is desired, enter the value 10. A value of 0 specifies that no reserved buffers are required by the queue (a minimal reserved size can still be applied for scheduling purposes). For policers, the size parameter is an integer expression of the number of kilobytes for the policer CBS. Values-0 to 1048576 or default.
